You're like salt. Salt is good. But if the salt stops tasting good, a person won't be able to cause it to taste good again. People will throw that salt away. Footnote: People use salt to cause food not to become bad. They also use salt to cause food to taste good. So Jesus probably meant his disciples caused the people of the earth not to become bad or they become good.You're like salt. Salt is good. But a man who was from Samaria was walking on that road. And when this man saw the man who lay by that road, he felt pity for that man. This man went to that man and helped him. This man put oil and wine on that man's wounds Primary: And put bandages on them. Alternate 1: And this man put pieces of cloth on those wounds. End of Alternates. Then he put that man on his donkey and took that man to an inn. Then this man continued taking care of that man at that inn.
